author: Andy Giddings
BBC Shropshire

documents.title: squirrel goes on sale in shropshire supermarket
text: a shropshire supermarket is now stocking a whole range of exotic meats , from camel to whole baby squid - but it takes a certain adventurous type to tuck in , store bosses admit .
author: South Shropshire Journal

documents.title: shropshire firefighters thanked by romanians
text: this halloween , a group of past and present shropshire firefighters are in transylvania , on an aid mission to donate replacement fire engines .
and the locals have shown their gratitude by holding a parade in their honour .
the shropshire-led team drove out to romania with an old fire engine , to donate it to the local fire service there and with several tonnes of aid .

documents.title: your photos : cloud hanging over south shropshire hills
text: we 've had some great photos shared by the bbc weather watchers this morning , but this one really stands out .
it was taken by snapper simon this morning , near church stretton .
that cloud seems to be resting on the landscape like a white duvet .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: dawley homes plan meeting this week
text: plans to build 18 bungalows in dawley are expected to move a step closer this week .
strata developments have applied to telford and wrekin council to erect the semi-detached and terraced bungalows on land opposite the phoenix academy .
the scheme 's been recommended for approval subject to the developers agreeing to pay nearly £ 11,000 to improve facilities at nearby dawley park .

documents.title: council warns of gridlock if roundabout work not carried out
text: the meole brace roundabout could become gridlocked in the future if work is n't carried out now , shropshire council has warned .

there have been protests this morning , as work got under way to remodel the roundabout , but council spokesman andrew boxall said it was need because the `` current infrastructure will not be able to cope '' once more houses are built in the town .
mr boxall also said the work had been planned for years would have `` absolutely minimal impact '' before christmas .
we need to look to the future to make sure that the infrastructure can cope with what 's changing . ''

documents.title: telford is england 's obesity surgery capital
text: telford and wrekin has england 's highest rate of surgery for obesity , with 46 in every 100,000 people going under the knife to lose weight .
author: Telford Journal

documents.title: halloween : spooky stops on the ghost train
text: from creepy crewe to killerminster - the train operator london midland has gone all out to mark halloween this year .
horrorford ( hereford ) - spookford-upon-avon ( stratford-upon-avon ) , liverpool slime street ( liverpool lime street ) and werewolverhampton ( wolverhampton ) are just some of my favourites .
top marks for creativity !
author: Stephanie Barnard
BBC Local Live

documents.title: mp joins call for more action against ivory trade
text: the north shropshire mp has joined conservationists , tv personalities , musicians and other politicians in calling for more action to be taken against the illegal ivory trade .

owen paterson has signed a letter sent to the british foreign and environment secretaries asking the uk government to take a number of steps , including closing legal loopholes which it claims allow the ivory to be sold as `` antique '' , as well as doing more to disrupt supply routes .
bryan adams , john cleese and the tv chef hugh fearnley-whittingstall are among the other names to have signed the open letter .
author: Andy Giddings
BBC Shropshire

documents.title: headlines : roundabout protests : gp surgery opens ; mp wants ivory trade action

BBC Shropshire

documents.title: shropshire rehab group set to expand
text: every year in the uk there are thousands of deaths and more than a million hospital admissions related to drinking - with the social , personal and economic cost estimated to be in the billions .
two years ago , a group called a better tomorrow was set up in telford to help drug addicts and alcoholics .
more than 100 people have passed through their doors , with many now free from their addictions .
author: Faith Page
Reporter, BBC Shropshire

documents.title: weather : a foggy halloween evening in shropshire
text: we 've got great weather for ghosts and ghoulies in shropshire tonight , with lots of mist and fog forecast .
author: Sara Blizzard
BBC Weather

documents.title: ice hockey : one win and one defeat
text: telford tigers beat guildford 4-1 last night .
it was a better performance than on saturday when they lost 6-0 at hull .
tigers lead the english premier league by three points .
it was important for us to bounce back guildford is a tough place to play , so to come and take two points is big for us . ''
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: seven-week pool closure starts today
text: a swimming pool in madeley will be closed for seven weeks starting today .
a new floor 's being put in at the abraham darby sports and leisure centre .
it 's set to reopen the week before christmas .
the rest of the centre will remain open as usual between now until then .

documents.title: football : tns keep on winning
text: the new saints of oswestry have n't lost a game this season - yesterday they secured a 3-0 victory over their nearest rival in the welsh premier , gap connah 's quay .
the goals came from wes fletcher , chris seargeant and jon routledge .
tns have now gone 15 games unbeaten in all competitions this season .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: protestors gather on meole brace roundabout
text: a number of protestors have turned up on the meole brace roundabout in shrewsbury this morning , to complain about the roadworks there .
shropshire council is remodelling the traffic island , with the aim of helping traffic flow better and to make it easier to cross for pedestrians and cyclists .

more than 4,000 people have signed a petition to oppose the work , with some complaining about the effect on wildlife and others saying they 're worried about the way the roundabout will operate on shrewsbury town match days .

documents.title: weather watchers : it 's foggy out there
text: a very foggy start across the county this morning - thanks to weather watcher kermitgreen for this view of wellington .
and just in case you 'd forgotten , it 's halloween !
a great spooky shot uploaded from raj 's range in telford .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: football : afc telford united 2-0 salford city
text: afc telford united 's mini revival on the field came to an end on saturday as they lost 2-0 to salford city .
the loss means the bucks slip to 15th in the national league north .
manager rob smith says his priority for the week ahead is to get new players into the club .
we 've got a few injuries and we 've literally got 15 players we 're getting to a stage where we 're that short we need players in . ''
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: headlines : protests over roundabout works ; new gp surgery opens ; rehab group to expand
text: our top stories this morning :
- protestors on meole brace roundabout in shrewsbury as work to remodel the island starts

author: Carlie Swain
BBC Local Live

documents.title: honey supplies back on track
text: bees in the midlands overcame summer starvation threats to provide more honey per hive than last year , according to figures released by the british beekeepers association .
the cold and windy spring meant bee keepers had to feed their colonies to keep them alive .
but the industry says its members ' hives were saved by a long , warm autumn .
author: Joanne Malin
BBC Midlands Today

documents.title: patients transferred to new whitchurch gp
text: the new claypit street medical practice in whitchurch opens today .
it replaces richmond house surgery which closed on friday and follows months of uncertainty for nearly 4,000 patients living in the town .
the new surgery , in the town 's community hospital , will open for emergency cases only today and tomorrow , with normal service starting on wednesday .

documents.title: football : new town boss brings home a point
text: manager paul hurst started his spell in charge of shrewsbury town with a draw at southend united .
town had gone 10 games without a win prior to hurst 's arrival earlier this week .
they went in front through adam el-abd , but stephen mclaughlin 's leveller meant the game ended all square at roots hall .
the point made little difference to the league one table - shrewsbury remain bottom of the table .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: appeal after report of girls forced into car
text: police in wellington want to find out what happened to two teenage girls who were apparently forced into a white mercedes .
they say they have n't had reports of anyone going missing , and there may be a fairly innocent explanation - but they need to check on the girls ' safety .
it happened on glebe street in the early hours of yesterday morning .
appeal for information after report of two females being pulled into a white mercedes on glebe st , wellington
